amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Salaries and Expenses, ATF and Explosives, by $15 million and to reduce funding for NASA Exploration by $23 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Salaries and Expenses, ATF and Explosives, by $15 million and to reduce funding for NASA Exploration by $23 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A031) Failed by voice vote.
